ai_prompts.component_creation: Use the MCP-style tools to create a new {component_name} component with full documentation, navigation updates, and consistent styling.
ai_prompts.token_update: Use the MCP-style tools to update {token_type} from {old_value} to {new_value} across all Design System files.
ai_prompts.navigation_fix: Use the MCP-style tools to fix navigation inconsistencies across all HTML files.
ai_prompts.deployment: Use the MCP-style tools to deploy the current Design System state to AWS ECS.

development_guidelines.always_use_tools: Always use the automation tools for consistency
development_guidelines.commit_frequently: Commit after each component or major change
development_guidelines.maintain_structure: Keep the established file structure intact
